description.plain:
“No Sleep” is an energizing radio banger by UK rap legend Sway featuring KSI, Tubes and Tiggs Da Author from his Wake Up EP.

There is a music video for this song, but despite being Sway’s song, it was posted on KSI’s channel.

description.plain: Sway at his very best on his first album, This Is My Demo. A song riddled with double meanings and clever similes by one of the most lyrically-gifted British rappers. This song was also featured on the soundtrack of the video game Need For Speed: Carbon.

songs.full_title: Still Sway & Kane by Sway (Ft. Kano & Tiggs Da Author)
songs.title: Still Sway & Kane
songs.title_with_featured: Still Sway & Kane (Ft. Kano & Tiggs Da Author)

description.plain:
The song is Sway’s take on Dr. Dre’s “Still Dre”.

It has more of a grimey/drum and bass feel to it than the original beat.

Sway said in an interview that he respects Dr. Dre and that he is one of his inspirations, so he wanted to do his take on the song.
